name: Centralis
description:
Centralis is a leading user experience research and design company located in the Chicago area. We help our clients succeed by making their products, services, software, and websites easier to use. We create superior user experiences that address customer needs thoughtfully and thoroughly, making it easier for people to accomplish their goals.
Founded in 2001, Centralis is a leader in the field of user experience, which integrates interface design with research skills, usability expertise and business strategy to ensure that products meet the needs of both businesses and customers. Our services include user research, user experience design, and usability testing. We have an onsite research lab custom-designed for user experience research, as well as a mobile lab for studying users wherever they are.
